channel.title: less intelligent on Workerpedia
channel.description: Recent content in less intelligent on Workerpedia

item.title: There is scientific evidence that backs the fact that black people are just less intelligent than other races; that's just how it is.
item.description: Black people (in the racial sense) aren’t inherently less intelligent than other races, and to posit otherwise would be entirely unscientific, because there is no scientific basis for such a claim. Black people, just like all other people, are shaped largely by their environments. Now if you’d like to discuss the environments Black people have been shaped by, that’s another (much longer) discussion. You could start with the fact that our ancestors came to the U.
